div.bibl: LIETUVA, Vol. XVI, No. 36, 9-6, 1907. NEW LITHUANIAN SOCIETY.

body.p: Hereby we announce to all the Lithuanians of the west side district, that we have organized a new Lithuanian Society under the name - The Lithuania's Brothers in America. Now is a good opportunity to join this new society; the initiative fee is only $1.00. The meetings are held every Saturday, 8:00 P.M.,- L.H. Getz Hall,- 147 Canalport Avenue.
